text: Jayakanthan (; 24 April 1934 â€“ 8 April 2015) was a Tamil writer, essayist, journalist, pamphleteer, filmmaker and critic. He was a recipient of both Jnanpith and Sahitya Akademi awards. Jayakanthan died on 8 April 2015 in Chennai after a long-illness, at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Indian critics Category:Indian journalists Category:People from Chennai
title: Jayakanthan
